details.excerpt: Week 19 commenced with a retrospective / review of Sprint Zero (which wasn't really a Sprint), followed by planning for [Sprint One](https://github.com/theodi/open-orgn-services/issues?milestone=1&page=1&sort=updated&state=open), in which we've actually started building things for other people! We're trying out a basic labelling system on github to keep track of what we are planning to do each sprint.
details.content:
Week 19 commenced with a retrospective / review of Sprint Zero (which wasn't really a Sprint), followed by planning for Sprint One, in which we've actually started building things for other people! We're trying out a basic labelling system on github to keep track of what we are planning to do each sprint.

Some architecture decisions were made - we're going to be be using Redisand Resqueas our message queue as we start to link up various APIs. Speaking of which, we've learned a great deal about creating events with Eventbrite and invoicing with Xero.

We had a crash-course in Vagrantand Drupalas we prepare to make some improvements to the ODI website, and Dave has been immersing himself in Google Refine,picking up some Jythonalong the way.

Jeni also spent some time preparing for her very well-attendedFriday Lecture.
